TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISerializable

summary.span: 允許物件控制它自己的序列化 (Serialization) 和還原序列化 (Deserialization)。

span.span: Allows an object to control its own serialization and deserialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能會序列化任何類別都必須標記為。Any class that might be serialized must be marked with the . 如果類別需要控制其序列化程序，它可以實作介面。If a class needs to control its serialization process, it can implement the interface. 呼叫序列化次並於其中填入提供來代表物件的所需的所有資料。The calls the at serialization time and populates the supplied with all the data required to represent the object. 建立與圖形中的物件類型。The creates a with the type of the object in the graph. 需要傳送本身可以使用的 proxy 物件和方法變更傳輸的資訊。Objects that need to send proxies for themselves can use the and methods on to change the transmitted information. 在類別繼承的情況下是可序列化的類別，衍生自基底類別實作。In the case of class inheritance, it is possible to serialize a class that derives from a base class that implements . 在此情況下，衍生的類別應該呼叫基底類別實作其實作內部。In this case, the derived class should call the base class implementation of inside its implementation of . 否則，將不會序列化的基底類別中的資料。Otherwise, the data from the base class will not be serialized. 介面隱含的建構函式簽章的建構函式 (的詳細資訊，內容)。The interface implies a constructor with the signature constructor ( information, context). 在還原序列化時，目前的建構函式呼叫中的資料後才已經還原序列化格式子。At deserialization time, the current constructor is called only after the data in the has been deserialized by the formatter. 一般情況下，這個建構函式應該受到保護，如果類別並未密封。In general, this constructor should be protected if the class is not sealed. 無法保證還原序列化物件的順序。The order in which objects are deserialized cannot be guaranteed. 例如，如果一個類型參考已不尚未還原序列化的型別，就會發生例外狀況。For example, if one type references a type that has not been deserialized yet, an exception will occur. 如果您要建立具有這類相依性的類型，您可以藉由實作暫時解決此問題`IDeserializationCallback`介面和`OnDeserialization`方法。If you are creating types that have such dependencies, you can work around the problem by implementing the `IDeserializationCallback` interface and the `OnDeserialization` method. 序列化架構會處理擴充的物件類型擴充的型別相同。The serialization architecture handles object types that extend the same as types that extend . 這些類型都可以使用標記並實作介面做為其他類型的物件。These types can be marked with the and implement the interface as any other object type. 將擷取其狀態的物件，並將其保存在資料流。Their object state will be captured and persisted onto the stream. 當透過使用這些類型，遠端執行功能基礎結構提供優先執行一般的序列化，並改為將序列化的 proxy 代理。When these types are being used through , the remoting infrastructure provides a surrogate that preempts typical serialization and instead serializes a proxy to the . 代理是協助程式知道如何序列化和還原序列化特定類型的物件。A surrogate is a helper that knows how to serialize and deserialize objects of a particular type. 類型 proxy，看不到在大部分情況下，使用者將會是。The proxy, invisible to the user in most cases, will be of type . 作為一般設計模式中，會是兩者都標記為可序列化的屬性和擴充的類別不尋常。As a general design pattern, it would be unusual for a class to be both marked with the serializable attribute and extend . 結合這兩個特性時，開發人員應該請仔細考慮有關可能之序列化和遠端處理案例。Developers should think carefully about the possible serialization and remoting scenarios when combining these two characteristics. 其中，這可能是適用的其中一個範例是使用。One example where this might be applicable is with a . 雖然的基底類別() 從延伸，便可擷取的狀態和還原在。While the base class of () extends from , it is possible to capture the state of a and restore it at will. 因此，它可能會有意義序列化資料庫上的這個資料流的狀態，並在稍後還原的時間。It might, therefore, be meaningful to serialize the state of this stream into a database and restore it at some later point in time. 不過，當使用遠端執行功能，此類型的物件會代理。However, when used through remoting, an object of this type would be proxied. 如需有關擴充的類別的序列化，請參閱。For more information about serialization of classes that extend , see . 如需有關實作，請參閱[自訂序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md)。For more information about implementing , see [Custom Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/custom-serialization.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用介面來定義自訂序列化類別的行為。The following code example demonstrates the use of the interface to define custom serialization behavior for a class. [!code-cpp[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ISerializable Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

para.span: 實作這個介面可允許使用它自己的序列化和還原序列化的物件。

span.span: Implement this interface to allow an object to take part in its own serialization and deserialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Sub GetObjectData (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: context
param.span: 這個序列化的目的端 (請參閱 )。

summary.span: 將序列化目標物件所需的資料填入 。

span.span: Populates a with the data needed to serialize the target object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含在任何物件自動追蹤和序列化格式子。Any objects that are included in the are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter. 呼叫的程式碼需要提供序列化服務。Code that calls requires the for providing serialization services. 關聯的列舉型別：。Associated enumeration: . > [!NOTE] > 不保證，呼叫這個方法會一次只能每個物件執行個體在序列化期間。It is not guaranteed that this method will be called only once per object instance during serialization. 因此，此方法應該實作其行為會不論呼叫的次數相同的方式。Therefore, the method should be implemented in such a way that its behavior will be the same regardless of the number of times it is called. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以設定替代的序列化物件的值。The following example uses the method to set alternate values for a serialized object. 程式碼會使用方法類別來序列化物件時，儲存的替代值。The code uses the method of the class to store the alternate values when the object is serialized. 相反地，當建構函式`Person`類別稱為還原序列化期間，使用擷取 alternatve 值方法並重新指派給物件的欄位。Conversely, when the constructor of the `Person` class is called during deserialization, the alternatve values are retrieved using the method and reassigned to the object's fields. [!code-csharp[ISerializable_GetObjectData#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable_GetObjectData/cs/ISerializable_GetObjectData.cs#0)] [!code-vb[ISerializable_GetObjectData#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ISerializable_GetObjectData/vb/ISerializable_GetObjectData.vb#0)]

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.
